stories.text:
I almost always use my own hotspot on my phone. I've noticed that since I arrived in Indonesia, I've been getting ssl warnings which say: "Warning: potential security risk ahead"

Hacker news and half of the internet has become unuasble without a VPN.

Can somebody explain to me why this is happening?
stories.title: Tell HN: Indonesian Telekomsel provider breaks HTTPS

stories.text:
Imagine you could create your own customized NFT slot machines and trade it on Adene NFT marketplace. Imagine owning the first ever slot machines that are NFTs – making each slot machine unique. Imagine a world where the games of chance are not owned by the casinos, but by you.

#Adenenftslotmachine #Adenecryptocurrency #Adenegamlingindustry
